div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Octobris anno quo supra

head.add: Statut of the lande tennentis and the Justice millis

div.p:
The saide day the tennentis of gardin bogferlow schethoisley crovis tulloche
hessilhed' countasuele and Rublislawe was accusit for the avay havin
of thar' corne and sukin fra the Justice myllis of the toune and withhaldin of
thar multur for the quhilkis thai put thame in wile Ande askit remitt
of the thingis bigan Offering thame to do It accordis thame at the
commavnd' of the toune And' thareftir the aldirman balyeis and counsale present
for the tyme Remittit thame the multur bigane one thar gude bering
Ande ordanit and chargit ale the tennentis and Inhabitantis of thar' said'
landis to bring ale the Cornis that grovis one the samyn to thar Justice
myllis and grind thar' and pay thar' mvltur and to help to bring hame the
mylstanez' Ande forthir to do ale and Sindrie thingis to the said' myle as
vys' and Consuetud' is and as vthir tennentis dois to thar lordis myllis
Ande gif thai falye in the presenting and bringin of thar' corne to the said'
myle or ony pont befor writin thai sale pay viij s' for amerciament and the hale
multur of thar cornes And' atour thai ordanit that nay persone hew or tak
ony part of thar wod' of the tulloche vndir the pane of law

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day viij dais
tile Androw stratone tile ansuer' to Robert Waus Curatour' to Robert
prat for certane maile et cetera as law wile and the said' Androw to ger'
cale patry chernsid' for his warand' et cetera

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next
Cumis to preiwe It that scho vndirstandis Robert hay is avand' to hir'

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Androw
Jamesone to preiwe the iiijor barrelis tar' his firing of the quhilkis Richerd'
Waus askit fraucht falyeing tharof to pay the fraucht of the said' iiijor barellis of
tar'

The saide day the wif of Johne talyour meg Downy gelis Anny meldrum the
wif of Johne hay the wif of James Kennery maly club maly bogy Isabele
hammyltone meg hay marione talyour meg mvske the wif of Johne gibsone
the wif of Donald baxtar the wif of morice talyour' the wif of michele bevmond'
the wif of Johne Kennerty conuict' be the Counsale in ane assis' for Spilling
of the mercat and baking of Saile cakis et cetera

head.add: statut of the vuire and nethir millis

div.p:
The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and Counsale
that ale the Inhabitantis of this burghe' sale ger' grunde al thar cornez
at thar' vuer' and nethir millis except the Induellaris one the west half
of the burne discendand' fra the vuire myle to the nethir myle quhilkis
Is annexit to the Justice myllis thar to ger' grynd' thar cornis and pay
thar multur et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die
mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The said' day Williame blakhale of that Ilk was conuict' be ane Suorne
assis' for the forstallin of the burghe in bying of woll' for the quhilkis
he was in amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' William blakhale was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for forstallin'
of the burghe' in bying of hidis for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' William blakhale was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for forstallin
of the burghe in bying of Skinnis for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of court et cetera

The said' day the said' William was conuict be ane assis' for regrating be his
seruandis et cetera for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day Androu gordone was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for for
stallin of the burghe in bying of hidis And' to vys' bot ane butht othir in
this burghe' or within ald' Abirdene Ande the aldirman and Counsale chargit
the said' Androu to decist fra the haldin of ane of the said' tua merchand'
buthtis et cetera

The said' day Isabele Ogstone was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Johne
cullane forspekar for tribulance of Norman leslie Officiar' for the quhilkis
scho was in Amerciament of the court' Ande gif scho trubulis ane Officiar' in tym'
to Cum and beis conuict tharof throu spilling of the mercat scho salbe expellit the
toune

The said day Duncan gilrutht was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Johne Cullan
forspekar for tribulance of Williame scrimgeor officiar ffor the quhilkis he was
in Amerciament of the Court

The said day Duncan gilrutht was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Johne of
Cullane forspekar for tribulance of Androw nachtj officiar for the quhilkis he
was in Amerciament of the Court et cetera And' atour It was deliuerit and ordanit be the
said' assis' that the said' Duncan sale mak tua wax candillis Ilkan
weing demi li' and Offir' thame to the haly blud' licht one Sonday that
next cumis in tyme of the hie mes' and ask the said' officiaris forgivnes

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdenn' Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjto
die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Androu Jamesoun' schipman grantit to pay to Richerd
Waus fiwe s' iiij d' for the fraucht of tua barrell of tar' within
viij dais And gif the said Androw preuis befor the skipper four'
barrellis of tar than' the said Richerd sale pay the said v s' and iiij d'
agane to the said Androw

The said day the bailyes chargit besse Waus to pay to Johnne'
tailyour fiwe schillingis within terme of lawe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
mensis octobris Anno quo supra

The said' day megis scot conuict' be hir' toung grant for brekin of Statutis of the
toune In candile making'

The saide day margaret in the gallougat candillis was weit and wantit j quartar of
a li' of talche of the wecht et cetera

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis monunday cum xv dais to mathou branche to
entir Johne smitht in Kinboge to Ansuer' to Symone ellon' and mak him pament
of iiijor stane of wole and iij s' and iiij d' as he that Come Souerte for him

head.add: the feing of Wille brovne sangstar

div.p:
The said' day Wille broune sangstar conducit and feit him with aldirman balyeis and Counsale
to Remane in thar seruice within thar parroche kirk and queir' and help to Syng and vphalde
divine seruice in singin at ale his pouer' for the termes of four' yeris and Oblist him be
his hande vphaldin to keip the saide seruice for the said' termes ffor the quhilkis
thai promittit to gif him his met and drink Circualie amang viij personis of the
tone and to pay him xiij s' and iiijor d' the first yer' to by him clathtis et cetera Ande
thareftir yerlie tile eyk his fee as he grovis in age and makis gude seruice

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to Androw ailhous' tile ansuer'
to the borghe fundin one him be William Colly for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
ane gowne wortht ix s' or ellis ix s'

The sid' day the balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj seriend' to warne Katherine Skynner to bring hir'
preuis and bessy Waus hir' preuis quhilkis thai haue and wile vys' anent ane pott debatabile
betuix tham to Comper befor tham this day viij dais to se quhay has mast richt to the
said' pot Ande to bring the said' pot to the said' day

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorn' assis' Johne of mar forspekar
that thomas riddaile sal entir ane callit logane that salit in the schip passand'
to the Islis befor the aldirman and bailyes within the tolbuth' betuix this and michael
mes' nixt to cum gif he cumis withtin this burgh' and' he may be comprehendit
to ansueir to thome pill for the tribulance of him And gif the said mane'
happinis to cum within this burgh' within the said terme of michaelmes'
and the said thomas Riddale entiris him nocht nor dois his diligens to entir
him befor the alderman and bailyes thane he sale ansuer to the said thome
pill for the tribulance of him

The said day thome straloche was conuict for the brekin of pace in
baking of breid for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdenn' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day Alexander bannerman' of Watirtoun' offerit him reddy yet
as of befor in the Name of Androw Johnesone that gif Johnne of
cullan' burges of the said burgh' preuis sufficiently befor the prouest and and balyes
counsaile that Androw Johnnesoun' is his feit man' and finde falt of his
seruice he has sustenit ony skaitht or that he hed done him ony skaitht
that being preuit he suld' haue the said' Androw and' he suld' be re
compensit of ale the skaitht that he hed done to him or hed' sustenit
throu him And' quhar the said Androw micht nocht recompens the said'
skaitht the said' Alexander suld' recompens It for him Nocht with
standing the said' Johnne' preuit nocht the siad' Androw his mane
nor na skaitht done to him be the said' Androw as yet

The said day the court wardit schew for lawe and It was gevin
for dome that the borrovis fundin be Johnne of cullan' in the handis of Androw
nauchtj officiar that thome coule and gilbert Wellis aucht to pas to the
assis' as witnes in the actioun' persewit be him agane Androw Johnesoun'
quhitfischear was fundin of Nane avale becaus thai war nocht
lauchfully summond be ane officiar at command of ane bailye And'
the recounpteris fundin be Alexander bannerman of Watirtoun' forspekar for
the said Androw that the said thomas and' Androw gilbert aw nocht to
pas as witnes to the said assis' was fundin awaile

The said day Dovny steuart sairstar was conuict be ane suorn' assis'
fo forspekar for the tribulance of William bisset
sairar And the said William quyt of ale tribulance of the said Dovny

The said day Adame sairar was conuict' for tribulance of the said
William bisset sairar and' the said William quyt of ale tribulance
of the said adame

head.add: Inquisicio magistri Jhone lindesay alias turing

div.p:
Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod magister
thomas lindesay alias turing est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam Robertj
gilbertj turing patris suj Ideo dederunt in mandatis thome Wod ballivo
ad cognoscendum procuratorem prefatj magistri thome ad terram suam Jacente
vno Inferiore ecclesie et cetera

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to patry chirn
sid to ansueir for xxij s' of maile follouit be Robert Waus rasit of
the laund pertenynge to vmquhile Dauid prat And' ordanit the sad' patry
to bring with him his richtis and euidentis quhilkis he has and will
vys' in the said matir

The said day thomas lesly and Johnne' colisone bailyes offerit
thame reddy to vndirly the decisioun' of ane assis' vnsuspect
in ony thingis that Androw Johnneson' hed' to say aganis thame
or gif thai hed doun' him ony wrang

The said day Comperit Johnne' of cullan and askit Androw
Johnnesoun' quhitfischear to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him
for the wranguis' takin of ane saill of the said Johnez'
out of his boit and' saling with It in ane vthir mannis boit
quhilk borgh' the said Androw witht Alexander bannerman'
of Watirtoun' his forspekar denyit And Incontinant thareftir
witht consent of baitht the said partijs the said borgh' was put
to the decisioun' of ane assis' of thir persounis vnder writin that
is to say James colisoune Johnne' ratre Johnne' of mar patry lesly
Alexander gray Robert crag Dauid steuart Johnne' arthour
patry chernsid Richerd Waus Robert Waus Androw barcar Androw
stratoun' burges of the said burgh' quhilkis riply auisit the gret
aitht suorn' fand and deliuerit that the said borgh' was of Nan'
awaile be the said James colisoun' forspekar of the said assis'

The said day thomas Waus balye chargit William scrimerour offi
ciar to warn' Androw Johnesoun' quhitfischear to the borgh' fundin
one him be the Johnne of cullan for the wranguis' takin of the
said Johnez' saile to friday that nixt cummis And' ordanit the
said William scrimgeour to warn' say mony witnes as the sad
Johhne' gifis him in to bill to compeir the said day

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to
Johnne' pantoun in coule to preiwe iiij s' x d' aving to him be
marioun' blak and' chargit Normund lesly officiar to warn' the
said Johnez' witnes to the said day

Eodem die Andreas Johnnesoun' pistator fecit constituit creauit nominauit
et ordinauit Alexandrum bannerman de Watirtoun' vicecomitis deputatis de Abirdene
suum legitimum et Indubitatum procuratorem in actione et causa motis et monendis
contra ipsum per Johannem cullan dans et concedens eisdem ac suis substitutis plu
ribus aut viij suam integram potestatem pro se et nomine suo adendum defenden
dum prosequendum calumpniandum Ceteram omniam et singulam faciendum et cetera in vbe
riore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariijs et oportuniis promit
tens de Rato et grato et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Tercio die
mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day Dauid blinseill lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit was
in ane amerciament of the court in falt of presence f to ansueir' for the tribulance
of Dauid menyeis and gilbert menyeis tharfor the prouest and bailyes
ordanit William scrimgeor normund lesly and' Androw nauchtj
to tak ane pund of the said Dauid and warn' him to ansueir
the morn' for the said tribulance

Eodem die Andreas Johnesone fecit constituit creauit nominauit Dauid menyeis
Johannem ruthirfurde militem et gilbertum menyeis coniunctim et diuisim suos legitimos et Indubitatos
procuratores actores et factores dandum et concedendum eisdem ac eorum quemlibet Cuilibet et suis
substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam liberam et Integram presentatem mandatumque speciale pro se et nomine
suo Ad respondendum plegio super eum per Johannem Cullan porrecto et cetera ac In omnibus aliis et
causis et actionibus contra eum per eundem Johannem motis sue monendis Agendum defendendum
prosequendum Calumpniandum Ceteram omniam et Singulam faciendum que dominus constituens
facere posset promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum
Ceteris clausulis necesseriis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Sexto die mensis
Nouembris anno quo supra

The said' day Dauid menyeis Complenyet lamentablie' that Dauid blinsele
hed' tribulit him besekand' the aldirman and balyeis of Remede of lawe
Ande thareftir the said Dauid blinsele was accusit for tribulance of the said' Dauid
menyeis quhilkis the said Dauid blinsele denyit And the said Dauid blinsele
Complenyeit that he was trubulit be the said' Dauid menyeis quhilkis the said
Dauid menyeis denyit And' in Continent with Consent of batht the said
pertiis the said' actioun' of trubulance was put to the decision' of ane
assis' of thir personis that is to say James Colisone Johne Ratre Alexander
gray William Wormet Dauid stevart William futhes patry leslie
eldar Alexander malysone Androw fyf dauid mar' eldar Androw stratone William
Colp Johne ramsay Jonhne arthour Williame Kintor Dauid fynne Androw
Stevinsone Androw meldrum and Johne malisone burges of the said burghe
quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aithe Suorne the Richtis resonnis
and allegaciounis of batht the said' partiis herd' seyne and vndirstand witnes
lauchfullie warnit Callit producit Suorne and deponit fande and deliuerit
ale in ane voce concordand' that thai coud' nocht acquit the saide Dauid blinsele
of the tribulance of the saide Dauid menyeis Ande the said Dauid men
yeis was quyt of ale trubulance of the said' Dauid blinsele
and that was gevin for dome

Inquisicio facta Coram honorabilibus viris Andrea Cullane preposito et thoma Waus
vno balliuorum burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti sexto die
mensis Nouembris Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo sexto per subscriptos videlicet Dauid
menyeis gilbertum menyeis Johannem Cullane Jacobum Colisone Johannem Ratre
Alexandrum gray Willelmum Wormet Willelmum futhes Dauid steuart Alexandrum malisone
Dauid fynne Willelmum Kintor matheum branche Andream stratone et Johannem
Ramsay burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus Prat patri
us Roberti prat latoris presencium obiit vltra vestitus et Sasitus ut de
feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de terra et crofto subscriptis videlicet
Jacente infra dictum burgum videlicet de vna terra Jacente in vico furcarum extra
portam eiusdem vici inter terram Andree murray ex boreali ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi
tulidef ex australi partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens
Et de crofto Jacente territorio occidentali croftorum dicti burgi inter terras de Rubislawe ex
occidentali et communiones vias regias ex orientali et boreali partibus et torrentem versus austrum
Et quod dictus Robertus est legitimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Roberti patruj
suj de dictis terra et crofto cum pertinencijs valent nunc per annus triginta solidos et value
runt xviij s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de Supprmo domino
nostro Rege per seruicium burgum Et nunc existunt In manibus domini nostri Regis
legitime per se ipsum ab decessum quondam dictum p Willelmum patruj suj per
aut eocirca In defetu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime
prosequentis datis et clausis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Dauid prat frater Roberti prat latoris
presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini
nostri Regis de terra et annuis redditibus subscriptis Jacente infra dictum burgum
videlicet de vno crofto Jacente ad le hedonishill continens in se tres riges
Cum horreo desuper edificato et orto eiusdem in longitudine a finibus ortorum Dauid
Adamsone quondam Duncanj lundoris et Johanne stevart ad terram Johanne Colison' le
helelandis vocatis versus oriens de vno annuo redditu sexdecim solidorum et octo denariorum
de Illis duabus terris cum bothis Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Angusij
adamsone ex boreali et tres Communiones vias regias versus oriens occidens et austrum
de vno annuo redditu decim solidorum et quatuor denariorum de terra quondam Johannis
nevisone piscatoris Jacente in vico Nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
altaris beati stephani ex australi ex vna et terram mathei branche ex boreali partibus
ab altera de vno annuo Redditu duodecim solidorum et octo denariorum de terra
quondam mathei Wricht Jacente in le gastraw inter terram quondam Symonis mason'
ex australi et terram quondam patricij smitht ex boreali de vno annuo redditu duodecim
denariorum de terra martinj Kempe Jacente in vico viridi extra le Denburne inter terram
WIllelmi Wyntone ex orientali et terram quondam Johannis sanclar' ex occidentali de vno annuo
redditu sexdecim denariorum de terra Willelmi Wyntone Jacente inter le Denburne ex
orientali et terram dicti martinj Kemp ex occidentali Ac de terra sine tenemento anteriore
et Interiore Cum suis pertinencijs Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter
Inter terram Johannis Andirsone ex australi ex vna et terram quondam magistri
Willelmj vmfray ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Robertus est legitimus
et propinquior heres dicti quondam Dauid pat fratris suj de dictis terris et annuis Red
ditibus Cum suis pertinenciis Et quod est legitime etatis Et quod dicte terre dictum Croftum
et tenentum sine terra anteriore et Interiore Cum suis pertinenciis valent
nunc per annum tres li' et x s' et octo d' et valuerunt xl solidos tempore pacis
Et quod dictum Croftum annuj Redditus et terra sine tenementum Cum suis pertinenciis tenentur in capite de Supprimo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et
nunc existunt In manibus domini nostri Regis legitime per se ipsum ob decessum
dicti quondam Dauid fratris suj per spacium vij annorum aut eocirca in defectu
veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis

Eodem die Robertus Waus deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostensionem
quod Dauid blinsele erit Indempnis pro Dauid menyeis aliter quam per viam Juris Et
Johannes Cullane deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostensionem quod dictus Dauid
menyeis erit Indempnes pro dicto Dauid blinsele aliter quam per viam Juris Et
vtraque dictarum parcium Obligantur per manus terras et bona ad releuandum et
conseruandum dictos suos plegios de huiusmodi fideiussione

The said' day Androw Wricht grauntit that he come Souerte to the spous' of William
Wormet for ane par of Camys' price vj s' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law

The said' day the Court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin for dome
that Androw Kennertj hede Sufficientlie preuit his govne was worthte
tuelf Schillingis quhen he departit fra It in Abirdene g for the quhilk he
he follouit Canny govne

The said' day thomas Waus ane of the balyeis assignit to Johne of Cullan'
monunday that next Cumis to bring his actis quhilkis he allegis to haue
for him and his richt agane Androw Johnesoun' befor the aldirman and Counsale
that thai mycht avys' tharwitht and caus' thame be vndirstandin for ministracion
of Justice Ande to do tharintile It that accordis tham to do

The said' day patry arthour lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be Cristj prat for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of Six franche crovnis of the rest of ane Obligacioun' et cetera of xxtj
schillingis of Siluer et cetera tharfor the balyeis chargit William scrimgeor seriand to pas'
and tak ane stres' of the said' patry and lat it Agane to borghe and It be
askit and warne him to Comper thar xv dais and it be lauchfule and falyeing
tharof the next lauchfule day thareftir follouing thar tile ansuer to the said' borghe
as thrid secund' day of process'

The said' day the balyes assignit monunday that next Cumis to Androw
ailhous tile ansuer' to the borghe fundin one be Johne Williame Colly for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of ane govne wortht ix s' as day of peremptour'

The said day the bailyes assignit this day aucht dais to Androw Johnnesoun'
quhitfischear to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of cullan for
the wranguis' takin of the saill of his bait and saland in the serefis bait

The said day Richert barnis one that ane part and meg blak one that vthir
part was oblist and suorn' the gret bodely aitht thar handis vphaldin
to stand and' abid at the deliuerance of Johnne of cullan and James
colisoun' chosin for the said Richerd' thomas lesly and Duncan crak chosin
for the said meg blak anent ale debatis clamis' and contrauersijs debatable'
betuix baitht the said partijs And' the said arbitouris to deliuer betuix
this and mertimes in the actiounis debatable' betuix the siad partijs

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdenn' tenta in pretorio eiusdem Nono
die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day Dauid Wricht lent the stanis of his land liand' on'
the northt sid of sanct nicholes kirk yard' to sanct nicholes' wark and'
the aldirman promittit to gif him samekle agan

The said day Johne andersone deponit be his aitht that Johnne' of meldrum
hed maid ane stickbed' ane stair to J ane Inloft and' thre glasin
wyndowis quhilkis was neuer allouit to him in his maile Nor
yet he gat na pament tharof

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorn' assis' Richerd Waus
forspekar that the borgh' fundin one Androw skynner be William Colle
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of an' govne wortht ix s' or
than ix s' of siluer was fundin awaill for the quhilkis the sad
Androw was in ane americament of the Court and to pay the said Soum'
Or thane the said' govne' quhilkis the balyes chargit him to pay
within terme' of lawe et cetera

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman bailyes
and part of the counsaile present that ale the skynnaris sale mak
Sufficient werk and thai set thar markis to gluffis and' ale vthir
stuf that thai sell to the vniuersite of Abirdene and quhay brekis
and beis conuict tharof sale pay viij s' vnforgevin and the wark
salbe eschet'

The siad' day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the counsale and communite
grantit to Dauid mar' youngar aslmekile of thar Crukit myer'
as thai wile prope for ale the dais of his liwe for the quhilkis
he sale keip the knock in the parys kirk as efferis Induring the said'
tyme

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die
mensis Nouembris anno quo supra

head.add: continuacio plegii porrecti per Johannez frater Andream Johnesone

div.p:
The saide day the borghe' fundin one Androw Jonhnesone be Johne cullan
was continevit with Consent of batht the said partiis to the morne
eftir Sanct nicholes day next hereftir vndir hoip of Concord' in siclik
strintht force and effect as It is now but preiudice tile ony partj Ande that
day tile ansuer' to the said' borghe' as law wile and thai accord' nocht

The said' day ser Andro Colisone executor to vmquhile Dauid prat producit ane
testiment in Jugement of the said' vmquhile Dauidis contening vij li' and iiij d'
beseking the balyeis that thai haue nay Interes' with the gudis put in the said'
testment Sene thai ar' testit gudis and pertenis nocht to thar' Jurisdictioun
The said day Androw Kennertj grantit him aving to Johne Colisone j barrel of atis

head.add: Caucion' for sclatis lent to the mastir of the skule

div.p:
The said' day Johne Ratre Come Souerte to the aldirman In the name
of mastir Williame strachin'

The said' day Duncan gilrutht one that ane part Ande Johne Andirsone one
that vthir part oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin
to stande and abid' at the deliuerance and ordinance of thomas Watsone Adam
Wer' Androw stevinson' Johne of murray anent the comptis and Rekning betuix thame
debatabile and thai to deliuer and forthgif thar deliuerance tharintile betuix this
and the fest of Sanct nicholes nixt hereftir

Eodem die Dauid' brois' amerciatur per confessione lingue propre pro perturbio domus
thome leslie balliuj Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The said' day Dauid broys' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Johne Cullane
forspekar for trubulance of Donald' baxtar and he quyt of ale trubulance of the said'
Dauid' et cetera ffor the amendis of the quhilkis the said' Dauid sale cum one
Sonday that next cumis with ane candill contening demi li' wax In tyme of the
hie mes' in his hand' and syt done one his kne and ask thomas leslie balye
forgiwnes and Offir' the said' Candill to the haly blud' licht And' atour he
sale Offir' ane vthir Candile to the said' haly blud' licht in the said' tyme
for trubulance done to the said' Donald baxtar And' gif ony of thame
vthir and beis conuict' tharof in tyme to Cum sale pay x s' to Sanct nicholes werk

The saide day It was deliuerit be the aldirman and Counsale that Dauid'
broys' sale freithe Donald' baxtar of the xv s' of annuele aucht to
mastir Dauid menyes of the termes bigan and the said' Dauid salbe dischargit
of ale the werk lummys and of the gret pott and of ale gudis of airschip
beinge vteuthe the said' Donaldis handis Ande the said' Donald'
sale pay ale vthir annuellis batht of the termes bigane and to Cum pertening
to his half of the said' land' of vmquhile gilbert Riburne

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
decimo sexto die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the alderman bailyes and consaill
that ale baxtaris withtin this burgh' sale haue Reddy breid of quhet
clene and fresche gud stuf the tua penny b laif wey and xxviij
vnce the penny laid xiiij vnce quhile the wigill of sanct Androwe and forthir
quhilke the counsaill be forthir auisit

The said day Androuw gordone Richerd redhed thome straloch' and gilbert
tulidef Ilkane of thame was in ane amerciament of the court for the brekin
of commoun ordinance in the menising of the pace be the haill counsaill

The said day the bailyes assignit friday cum xv dais to Androw gordoun'
merchand man to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne andersoun'
for the wranguis' Intermeting with of his chamer and' away takin of certan'
gudis pertenyng to the said' Johnne andirsoun'
